Blackfang was somewhat surprised by the question and didn't quite 
seem to know the answer.

Blackfang: In fact, Cybertron is completely covered by metal, but some 
say that it was once organic. We have organic parts because this 
alternate form, I think, was more energy-efficient than the older 
autobot and decepticon models.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightlight::
> 
> "More metallic??" said Nighlight "so organic parts isn't common 
> there?? I wanna mean is all the city and the cybertronians all 
> mettallic??? why have we parts organics???"
